amendment.description: To strike supplemental staff funding available only to a limited number of Senators in a time of sequestration.
amendment.purpose: To strike supplemental staff funding available only to a limited number of Senators in a time of sequestration.

action.text: Amendment SA 25 proposed by Senator Paul.

vote.text: Amendment SA 25 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 29.
